code: import React from"react";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import Order from"../Order/Order";var OrdersCardView=function OrdersCardView(props){var history=useHistory();if(!props.orders||!props.orders.length){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,"No Orders found");}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{marginRight:"10%",marginLeft:"10%"}},props.orders.map(function(order,i){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Order,{key:order.id/* order.idOrder */,order:order,onClick:function onClick(){history.push("/vieworder/".concat(order.id),{orderObj:order});}});}));};export default OrdersCardView;
